website_summaries.verdict: Provides a high level of craftsmanship in a hammer with a wooden handle, but it's pricey.
pros: Head of the shingle hammer includes a notch so you can quickly pull old nails
Gives you 17 ounces of weight, so it shouldn't wear you down too quickly
Includes a sliding gauge to help you finish the job more efficiently
Allows you to work fast, especially when hammering felt by hand
Wooden handle is of a good quality
cons: Doesn't have the weight some may want in a shingle hammer for driving nails

customer_reviews.title: Great for felting. Haven’t seen any other use for it.
customer_reviews.text: I can hit plastic caps down really fast but my guys not so much. Using this hatchet and metal caps makes them cap nail felt like 200 percent faster! And you don’t have to be a veteran roofer to go fast. It’s so easy to just go fast every person on the job can go fast. Makes felting a dream easier. I don’t really see it being good for handbanging roofing nails though. The magnet is smooth (no waffle) so its likely to slip off nail. Also I can see having a nail on the end of the hatchet without knowing and you go to set another nail! OUCH! Good for felting, nothing else really.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: great for laying  felt
customer_reviews.text: this mag hatch is a great tool to have as a roofer laying felt. It makes it so much faster to cap nail your felt down. Definitely worth the buy. You definitely still want to carry your regular hammer around as well this mag hatch is not a replacement for a regular hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Riutta

customer_reviews.title: Authentic AJC Hachet
customer_reviews.text: The best, actually the only, roofing hammer to buy. If you work in this industry and do not have an AJC hatchet already you are either new, or won’t last long. These aren’t cheap or easy to find, but if you work in this field you will see them often. This product is exactly as described, and imperative to being a good roofer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Saves a ton of time
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Makes laying felt nails a breeze. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It works amazingly well! Super good for button caps!
customer_reviews.author: Grishord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday roofing Perfect for hand banging felt . I Love it Update:9/4/16 still working great . Can't pull tacks unless they are sticking up a good bit . It is prices to high but maybe the process of forging the magnet in the face is labor intensive? Anything made by AJC Tools is made good and durable i have their jacks (best on market) two different size magnetic sweepers. A former roofer has to be designing their tools.
customer_reviews.author: superoofer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for someone else. He said they came in handy on his job.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It is doing the job that we purchased it for. Roofing and carpentry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: This is "THE" Hammer For roofing Nails and tarp nails! Ever nail close to the edge? Get this hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great roofing hammer, really speeds things up.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Really makes things easier, especially on steep pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Brummett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband he uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Ney

customer_reviews.title: Great serup just needs blades.
customer_reviews.text: Nice setup just wished they sent info on where to get blades as they have a hole in the middle for the carage bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This hammer is well designed and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Smartly designed and very well made. The weighted magnetic head is great.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Has a MAGNET
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this was the coolest hammer he has ever seen. It had a magnet at the end of the tip. Thank you for having such a Great Product. His Father's Day was memorable.
customer_reviews.author: Moocee

customer_reviews.title: Very well made most important things is American made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product and American made as well but a little bit over price in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this hatchet. My son in law is a roofer and he was very pleased with this product for removing shingles.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my dad & he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne Medellin Rubio

customer_reviews.title: These hatchets are by far the best you can buy
customer_reviews.text: These hatchets are by far the best you can buy. However the company that sells them on Amazon doesn’t have much between the ears.
customer_reviews.author: RCMedic12

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: The fully magnetic tip on this hammer makes roofing so much easier and fun. No more worries about hitting your fingers or struggling holding a shingle/ felt in place on a steep roof. It also works great for nailing on metal on flat roofs. The weight of the hammer is perfect and the sliding knife blade also comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: scott kleinholz

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a roofer and says this makes "drying in" a breeze will buy again when needed but that may be awhile since my husband says he will likely loose it before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great tool if you don't have a nail gun
customer_reviews.text: Great tool if you don't have a nail gun. Last time I did a roof I used a regular hammer and wacked my thumb so many times it hurt for a month after I was done.
customer_reviews.author: OLDNCHEAP

customer_reviews.title: he says it's great for getting the nails out when he is roofing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend, he says it's great for getting the nails out when he is roofing.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Husband needed this for work would have been great if it would have had the blade attached like ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed this for work would have been great if it would have had the blade attached like it mentions and is shown in the picture, disappointed in that!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Oliver

product_meta.title: AJC Hatchet MWT-005-MH 17oz Magnet Roofing Hatchet
product_meta.description: Magnetic roofing Hatchet is manufactured with a solid construction easily withstanding tough use on the jobsite. Features a built-in utility blade, sliding gauge and nail claw ensuring easy, hassle-free use. Product is available in a 7oz size.
